Common names: (Salts from Water from Medical Lake nearSpokane, Wash.)Chuck-Water and Skookum-Strong
name: Skookum chuck
Relationship: SAXONITE - (appears to have remarkable cleansing, deodorizing and soothing properties for the skin. (Cowperthwaite.) Eczema, scalds, burns, sores and hemorrhoids).
details: Otitis media. Profuse, ichorous, cadaverously smelling discharge. Lithemia. CATARRH. Urticaria. SKIN AFFECTIONS. ECZEMA. DRY SKIN. HAY-FEVER. Profuse coryza and constant sneezing.Has strong affinity for skin and mucous membranes - an anti-psoric medicine.
